unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Chennai Traffic Police are at it again, tweaking the rules to keep our roads a little less chaotic, especially with Onam around the corner and everyone rushing about.
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Chennai Traffic Police are at it again, tweaking the rules to keep our roads a little less chaotic, especially with Onam around the corner and everyone rushing about.

unnormalised: Word on the street is they're clamping down on helmetless riders and triple-riding on bikes. Fines could be hefty - expect to shell out upwards of Rs. 1000 for your carelessness.
normalised: Word on the street is they are clamping down on helmetless riders and triple-riding on bikes. Fines could be hefty - expect to shell out upwards of rupee one thousand for your carelessness.

unnormalised: And remember that crazy roundabout near Anna Salai? Yeah, they're implementing a new lane discipline system there to avoid those daily jams. Apparently, it's all about smoother flow and less honking, hopefully making your biryani run less stressful.
normalised: And remember that crazy roundabout near Anna Salai? Yeah, they are implementing a new lane discipline system there to avoid those daily jams. Apparently, it is all about smoother flow and less honking, hopefully making your biryani run less stressful.

unnormalised: Also, watch out for increased surveillance on highways leading out of Bangalore. Speed limits are strictly enforced – stick to the 80 km/hr limit folks, unless you fancy a challan ruining your weekend getaway plans. They're even using drones now, so no hiding!
normalised: Also, watch out for increased surveillance on highways leading out of Bangalore. Speed limits are strictly enforced – stick to the eighty kilometer per hour limit folks, unless you fancy a challan ruining your weekend getaway plans. They are even using drones now, so no hiding!

unnormalised: The new regulations also include designated parking zones coming up near T. Nagar to curb illegal parking and make shopping a breeze.
normalised: The new regulations also include designated parking zones coming up near T. Nagar to curb illegal parking and make shopping a breeze.

unnormalised: Seems like the police are serious about making our roads safer, one regulation at a time. Drive safe, and Happy Onam!
normalised: Seems like the police are serious about making our roads safer, one regulation at a time. Drive safe, and Happy Onam!
